settings.summary: Default parameters for controlling run behavior of build-docs.
settings.description: Config options for Initialization `init[]` and Output `out[]` used by build-docs to manage generation.

out.description: Options for where build-docs will generate the results, the filename, and what format to generate them in.

options.title: outputPath
options.description: Output options to be used build-docs. Default is the root of where it was executed from `.dist`.

options.title: outputName
options.description: Output name to be used for build-docs.

options.title: outputFormat
options.description: Output format to be used for build-docs.

options.title: writeMode
options.description: If a file already exists behavior, and option to make unique.

supported.title: overwrite
supported.description: Opens file for overwrite. The file is created if it does not exist.

supported.title: new
supported.description: Always builds a a new file with a unique id of date-time.

init.description: Options to determine how the build-docs defaults set by build-docs constructor.

options.title: targetPath
options.description: The root directory to search for documentation within by build-docs.

options.title: targetPaths
options.description: Optional Paths to be used for build-docs.

options.title: targetFileTypes
options.description: The file types to extract build documentation from.

options.title: ignoreFiles
options.description: Files to ignore when building documentation.

options.title: targetFiles
options.description: Array of specific files to target

options.title: ignorePaths
options.description: Paths to ignore when building documentation.
